text: "I Just Want to Be Your Everything" is a 1977 song by English singer Andy Gibb and is the leading single from his debut studio album Flowing Rivers. It went to number 1 in Australia, Brazil, Canada, Chile and the United States, number 2 in New Zealand, number 13 in Spain, number 24 in the Netherlands and number 26 in the United Kingdom. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1978. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1977 songs Category:Andy Gibb songs
title: I Just Want to Be Your Everything
